name: Sea To Summit Comfort Plus SI Sleeping Pad - Women's
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: Sleep soundly with luxurious padding between you and the cold ground. The women's Comfort Plus is shaped narrower in the shoulders and wider in the hips and knees to provide a more comfortable sleep. Extra insulation in the hip and foot areas provide more support and warmth where you want it most.Quite polyester face fabric with a non-slip surface on the underside.Delta Core™ PU foam with cut-outs to reduce weight and packed size.Smaller cut-outs under hips and feet.Multi-fuctional one-way inflate valve flips over to prevent air re-entering during deflation.Includes stuff sack, repair kit, and PillowLock™ for use with Aeros™ pillows.
